hiveArticle.title: We Won #IndiaWelcomesCrypto
hiveArticle.body:
Today is the biggest day for the entire crypto community in India because the Supreme Court has rejected Reserve Bank of Indiaâ€™s (RBI) banking ban on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.

We all have won as because we were fighting this battle for the last 2 years. #IndiaWelcomesCrypto

Now since the Supreme Court has given its verdict, banking access to buy cryptos should pick up again. This will provide liquidity and easy access to the market for many exchanges to come in.
